CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Drone Delivery relative to Standard Shipping?
SRP.A: Drone Delivery is {below} Standard Shipping in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Drone Delivery}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Shipping}.

VE.Q: What is Drone Delivery's Delivery Time in 1989?
VE.A: Drone Delivery's delivery time in 1989 is {3.22} days.

VE.Q: What is Standard Shipping's Delivery Time in 1987?
VE.A: Standard Shipping's delivery time in 1987 is {1.51} days.

VE.Q: What is Drone Delivery's Delivery Time in 1984?
VE.A: Drone Delivery's delivery time in 1984 is {2.73} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {1.24} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {3.25} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery reached approximately {3.25} days in {1988}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery's lowest recorded level is approximately {2.54} days in {1983}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {4.79} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 4.90 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time fall between 4.57 and 5.05 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 4.72 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 1987 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 1987 was {higher} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1988, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1985 and 1988 was {smaller} than between 1985 and 1989.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 1984 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 1984 was {higher} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1986, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1983 and 1986 was {smaller} than between 1988 and 1989.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Drone Delivery} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Standard Shipping, Drone Delivery}.
